about.title: ABOUT ME
about.about-me: Hello! My name is Lucas, and I am a passionate front-end developer specializing in HTML, CSS, JavaScript, and React. Besides programming, I enjoy skateboarding and playing video games, and I am always seeking new challenges in the world of web development. I am prepared to contribute my passion and skills to exciting and innovative projects. Let's build something amazing together!

Asynchronous data fetching from a REST API is handled using the Fetch API.
